author: pellekrab
content:
Nico‚Äôs config fixed the issue for me, not sure why tho, it‚Äôs practically the same.
```yaml
participants_matrix:
  el:
    - el_type: reth
      el_image: sibkatya/reth:focil-0e41c92
    # - el_type: geth
    #   el_image: jihoonsg/geth-focil:1a1adcd
  cl:
    - cl_type: lodestar
      cl_image: local/lodestar:focil
      supernode: true
      count: 2
network_params:
  genesis_delay: 20
  electra_fork_epoch: 0
  fulu_fork_epoch: 0
  eip7805_fork_epoch: 1
  seconds_per_slot: 6
  num_validator_keys_per_node: 256
snooper_enabled: true
additional_services:
  - dora
  - tx_fuzz
  - spamoor
  - prometheus_grafana
port_publisher:
  additional_services:
    enabled: true
    public_port_start: 65500
spamoor_params:
  spammers:
    - scenario: eoatx
      config:
        throughput: 100
    - scenario: uniswap-swaps
      config:
        throughput: 100
    - scenario: blob-combined
      config:
        throughput: 5
global_log_level: info
```
